description: Model Context Protocol server providing AI assistants with comprehensive access to eBay's Seller APIs for inventory management, order fulfillment, marketing campaigns, and account configuration.
rules: Always set environment variables in .env file before starting the server
Use ebay_get_oauth_url to generate authorization URLs for user tokens
Store sensitive credentials in .env file, never commit them to version control
Run automatic setup script for MCP client configuration: npm run auto-setup
Use TypeScript for better type safety when working with eBay API responses
All 140+ tools follow the naming convention: ebay_[category]_[action]
Check token expiry with ebay_validate_token_expiry before making API calls
Production environment requires eBay App Review approval
OAuth tokens expire after 2 hours, refresh tokens last 18 months
Inventory tools require SKU as primary identifier
Use bulk operations for efficiency when managing multiple items
Marketing tools require marketplace_id parameter for campaign targeting
Order fulfillment requires shipping fulfillment creation before marking shipped
Always validate eBay API rate limits when building automation
